Text: Thank you from a Canadian in France !!!!!

Awesome ceremony.
Unfortunately NBC did not broadcast the original OBS (Olympic Broadcast Services) transmission, which most of the European networks relayed; they appear to be using their own cameras and positions, so this version misses some of the charm.
But it still is something that should not be missed :)
